body_html:
Hi,
I also encountered the same error. Below is my setup in Google VM instance:

GPU : Nvidia Tesla K80
OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04):Linux Ubuntu 16.04
TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): sudo pip install —upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow_gpu-1.3.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
TensorFlow version (use command below):Tensorflow_gpu_1.3.0
Python version: 2.7
CUDA/cuDNN version:CUDA 8/Cudnn 5.1

Would really appreciate some help here!!

body:
Hi, 
I also encountered the same error. Below is my setup in Google VM instance:

GPU : Nvidia Tesla K80
OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04):Linux Ubuntu 16.04
TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): sudo pip  install —upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow_gpu-1.3.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
TensorFlow version (use command below):Tensorflow_gpu_1.3.0
Python version:  2.7 
CUDA/cuDNN version:CUDA 8/Cudnn 5.1


Would really appreciate some help here!!
